abstract: Dow Jones industrial average falls 207 points, or 1.74 percent, to 11.706.62; Standard & Poor's 500-stock index loses 2 percent, to 1,229.05; Nasdaq composite index slides 2.3 percent, to 2,638.42.
snippet: Concerns about the outcome of a meeting of European leaders on Wednesday weighed on financial stocks especially.
lead_paragraph: Concerns about the outcome of a meeting of European leaders on Wednesday weighed on financial stocks especially.

headline.main: Stocks Close Sharply Lower on News From Europe
headline.print_headline: Stocks Close Sharply Lower on News From Europe
headline.seo: Stocks Close Sharply Lower on News From Europe
